title: Introduction
content: Welcome to Codefeast! Our Terms and Conditions outline the essential rules and guidelines for participating in our coding training and mentorship programs. By joining our platform, you confirm that you meet the eligibility criteria. This ensures that learners can responsibly engage with the educational material and mentorship services we provide.
